verses: Salt is good, but if the salt has lost its saltiness, how will you make it salty again? Have salt in yourselves, and be at peace with
If I then, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also ought to wash
A new commandment I give to you, that you love
: just as I have loved you, you also are to love one another.
A new commandment I give to you, that you love one another: just as I have loved you, you also are to love
By this all people will know that you are my disciples, if you have love for
This is my commandment, that you love
Do not be haughty, but associate with the lowly. Never be wise in your own sight.
